channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There is a dead bird on the Terrace of Palgrave, closest to number 30, 23rd September
item.description:
This dead bird is on the back terrace near number 30 , there are feathers everywhere - senior citizens have tried to remove it but it is stuck on the net.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Bethwin Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree Causing Damage, 23rd September
item.description:
Resident called advise tree outside her property 35 Inglewood Road is causing damage to her drive way and the berries from tree are also staining the drive. Please can we inspect and advise caller.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Inglewood Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of household items, 23rd September

item.title: Van parked in alleyway entrance, 23rd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chequers Way, Bowes, London
